name: Unstable Gun Meets Zombies: Remix
description:
A post-Ludum Dare Version of "Unstable Gun Meets Zombies"

Original LD Submision : https://its-f4llen.itch.io/unstable-gun-meets-zombies

Unstable Gun Meets Zombies! isabout a retired army General that has had enough and is doing his army's job, takes the city and disables the almost exploding reactor!

But his gun is unstable you switch from healing enemies to dealing damage, Good luck and have fun!

Ps: Made in 72H for Ludun Dare Game Jam!

And recommend playing full screen!

Controls:

WASD - MOVE

Mouse - Shoot and pass cutscenes!
